column5: Overlooks the Comal River! Come relax in this 2 bedroom/2 bath rental that accommodates 6 guests. The unit has 1 King, 1 Queen and 1 Sleeper bed. This unit is fully furnished and equipped with towels, linens, cookware, washer, dryer, flat screen TV, DVD player, VHS and more! Enjoy a relaxing day by the pool or hot tub.
column8: Waterfront Condo on the Comal River. - Camp Warnecke - C218
